customOrderTip: Set custom order for languages, separated by English commas ,, up to 300 languages. These languages will appear at the top of the list.
frequencyTopCountTip: Set the number of top languages to display when sorting by frequency (1-15).
frequencyDaysRangeTip: Set the time range in days for frequency statistics (1-90).
otherCustomLanguagesTip: Add other languages not in the built-in list, separated by English commas ,, up to 300 languages. These languages won't be pinned to the top by default and will be sorted alphabetically.
excludedLanguagesTip: Enter built-in languages to hide from the list, separated by English commas ,, up to 300 languages.
